methods.name: doc_id
title: Gcloud
Search
Result#doc_id
methods.description: The unique identifier of the document referenced in the search result.

methods.name: token
title: Gcloud
Search
Result#token
methods.description: The token for the next page of results.

title: Gcloud
Search
Result#[]
methods.description: Retrieve the field values associated to a field name.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
search = gcloud.search
index = search.index "products"

documents = index.search "best T-shirt ever"
document = documents.first
puts "The best match for your search is:"
document["description"].each do |value|
  puts "* #{value} (#{value.type}) [#{value.lang}]"
end

params.name: name
params.description:
The name of the field. New values will be
configured with this name.

methods.name: fields
title: Gcloud
Search
Result#fields
methods.description: The fields in the search result. Each field has a name (String) and a list of values (FieldValues). (See Fields)

methods.name: each
title: Gcloud
Search
Result#each
methods.description: Calls block once for each field, passing the field name and values pair as parameters. If no block is given an enumerator is returned instead. (See Fields#each)

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
search = gcloud.search
index = search.index "products"

documents = index.search "best T-shirt ever"
document = documents.first
puts "The best match for your search is:"
document.each do |name, values|
  puts "* #{name}:"
  values.each do |value|
    puts "  * #{value} (#{value.type})"
  end
end

methods.name: names
title: Gcloud
Search
Result#names
methods.description: Returns a new array populated with all the field names. (See Fields#names)

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
search = gcloud.search
index = search.index "products"

documents = index.search "best T-shirt ever"
document = documents.first
puts "The best match has the following fields:"
document.names.each do |name|
  puts "* #{name}:"
end
